trans-unit.source: HDInsight article index for Azure portal | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: HDInsight article index for Azure portal | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: An index page with links to articles about HDInsight on the Azure portal. Microsoft recommends the Azure preview portal for new Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: An index page with links to articles about HDInsight on the Azure portal. Microsoft recommends the Azure preview portal for new Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Use this index page to find articles covering HDInsight on the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Use this index page to find articles covering HDInsight on the <linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight is a cloud distribution of open-source Hadoop and the Hortonworks Data Platform.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight is a cloud distribution of open-source Hadoop and the Hortonworks Data Platform.

trans-unit.source: This documentation index page is for customers who already have solutions deployed to the current Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This documentation index page is for customers who already have solutions deployed to the current Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal for new HDInsight clusters:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal for new HDInsight clusters:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Go to HDInsight preview portal documentation</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Go to HDInsight preview portal documentation</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Go to the Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Go to the Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight on the Azure portal will not receive upgrades after July 2015 and is replaced by the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight on the Azure portal will not receive upgrades after July 2015 and is replaced by the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: If you're new to Hadoop on HDInsight, go to the <linkText>HDInsight documentation page</linkText><title></title> to get started with the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: If you're new to Hadoop on HDInsight, go to the <linkText>HDInsight documentation page</linkText><title></title> to get started with the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: For a complete set of articles about using Linux and Linux clusters, go to the <linkText>HDInsight documentation page</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete set of articles about using Linux and Linux clusters, go to the <linkText>HDInsight documentation page</linkText><title></title>.
